title: Phils agree to deal Michaels to Tribe
subtitle: Phils acquire Rhodes for Michaels
body: PHILADELPHIA -- The off-again, on-again deal between the Phillies and Indians is on again. After a week of false starts and tweaks, Philadelphia may have finally acquired Cleveland reliever Arthur Rhodes for outfielder Jason Michaels. Rhodes, 36, took a physical on Friday in Philadelphia, a team source said, which should complete the Phillies' portion of a larger deal that might lead to Coco Crisp's long-awaited arrival in Boston. The source cautioned that Rhodes isn't the final hurdle, which might delay the announcement. Ken Mandel is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Ken Mandel
